title: Users grant Discogs the right to use their content across all their services

tosdr.case: The copyright license that users grant this service is limited to the parties that make up the service's broader platform.
tosdr.tldr: Discogs and its related platforms are based on user content. As such, by using the service, users grant Discogs a non-revocable and transferable right to use their content for as long as they wish, wherever they wish.
